description:
Bonzer Technologies is one of the few offshore software development companies in India that offers high-end web design services in India along with web application development services too.
We offer certified expertise in designing and developing dynamic websites using PHP5 and frameworks like Symphony 2, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Wordpress.
For databases we use MySQL and doctrine ORM. We are well versed with JQuery, Ajax, XML, XHTML, AngularJs, NodeJs and so on. Responsive and interactive web design is key to a good website. We take care of aesthetics and web development, using the latest web development technologies to create a perfect user experience for your clients.
